page.title: 08WEST DURRINGTON ESTATE cont.
page.content: W. Durrington is a popular area. The survey showed that the style and price of houses and the layout of the estate were the main reasons why people chose to live there. There is a carefully planned variety of housing with most attractive open plan front gardens. SHOPPING CENTRE The hub of the estate is the shopping precinct with a Tesco superstore and a large free carpark. It serves a wide area . Out of 1500 shoppers questioned less than 300 were estate residents. 82% had driven from places within a 5 mile radius but 10% had travelled between 10 -15 miles. AMENITIES There is a community centre with a varied programme of leisure activities, a youth club and recreation area. People questioned thought a post office, more shops and a swimming pool would be improvements.
